elements.title: Yank pin-ups (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Yank pin-ups (example pictured) were distributed to American military personnel during World War II to promote morale?

elements.title: alopekis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that ancient Greek philosopher Xenophon thought the alopekis was part dog, part fox?

elements.title: September 2023 southwestern U.S. floods (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that at least 73,000 attendees were stranded at Burning Man because of the September 2023 southwestern U.S. floods?

elements.title: Tito Masoud (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hamas militant Tito Masoud, who manufactured the first Qassam rocket, became wanted by Israel after a colleague revealed his name under interrogation?

elements.title: Froge.mp3 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the mixtape Froge.mp3 took its title from a nickname that Piri & Tommy gave each other?

elements.title: 1893-S Morgan dollar (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that an 1893-S Morgan dollar sold for US$2,086,875.00 in 2021?

elements.title: BOW counties (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the BOW counties in Wisconsin were one of the regions of the U.S. that helped Joe Biden win the presidency in 2020?

elements.title: Samson lost his mate Hercules (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after 233 years of being united, Samson lost his mate Hercules?
